content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":11351,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6aa317d1-09e0-4163-8b60-ed41f8f23a34/MicrosoftTeams-image (60).png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6aa317d1-09e0-4163-8b60-ed41f8f23a34/MicrosoftTeams-image (60).png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image (60).png\",\"name\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image (60).png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6aa317d1-09e0-4163-8b60-ed41f8f23a34\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":522,\"height\":153},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to work with Outlook\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You already know that Outlook and Teams are our main tools for collaboration and exchanging information. Try to structure them in the most comfortable way for you: soon there will be a lot of important emails with tasks, information about new courses, or company news.   \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The best practice is to organize your Inbox Folder. The goal of organizing Outlook is to reduce the amount of unnecessary \\\"noise\\\" in your Inbox and to make the most important items bubble to the top. The tool Rules helps this process by moving messages into folders based on criteria that you set. Rules filter messages coming into your Inbox for must-read items only.   \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to Create a rule on a message?   \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Watch the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/set-up-rules-in-outlook-75ab719a-2ce8-49a7-a214-6d62b67cbd41\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"video\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or follow the instructions below: Right-click an existing message and select Rules > Create Rule.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Select a condition, and what to do with the message based on the condition. For example, to move messages with a certain title to a specific folder, select the Subject contains condition, select Move the item to folder, select or create a New folder, and then select OK.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When you're done creating the rule, select OK.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To use the rule right away, select Run this new rule now on messages already in the current folder checkbox, and then select OK. The message now appears in that folder.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn more\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" about the possibilities of Outlook \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/best-practices-for-outlook-f90e5f69-8832-4d89-95b3-bfdf76c82ef8\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/work-together-in-microsoft-teams-8066077a-e2a7-45b7-a8d1-adfd0a944b67\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Teams\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":200299,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bf5ce07c-42cb-4f6d-9ee9-6070749606c4/Picture11.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bf5ce07c-42cb-4f6d-9ee9-6070749606c4/Picture11.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture11.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture11.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"bf5ce07c-42cb-4f6d-9ee9-6070749606c4\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":776,\"height\":724},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
